original_title: Stereo (Tile 3B of a CAEE Educational Mosaic)
overview: Disguised as an educational film. Stereo purports to be a report on the "Canadian Academy of Erotic Inquiry's" experiments to induce telepathy in eight experimental subjects. It follows the effects of the experiment using the theoretical framework of the parapsychologist Luther Stringfellow. The film is virtually silent except for commentary by the experimenters.
title: Stereo (Tile 3B of a CAEE Educational Mosaic)
